title: I'm sorry, but could someone please tell me how this is a 2 week ban worthy game?
body:
So yeah, I admit I was getting super tilted not too long ago, few weeks maybe, blaming people for my mistakes, the usual. I got chat banned and quickly addressed it and now I barely speak in chat. So I just got out of a game in which my jungler went 1-11 (it wasn't his fault, he just had a very bad game) and my top laner told us he was going to intentionally feed because of the jungler. Logs below:

Game 1
In-Game
Emperør Rhaast: silver elo
Emperør Rhaast: i should pick senna really

Emperør Rhaast: just play fiddle mistakes happen

Emperør Rhaast: i Know

Emperør Rhaast: teemo still blaming jg when he has 39 cs vs a melee ahahah
Emperør Rhaast: u guys are both blind
Emperør Rhaast: and ryze as well
Emperør Rhaast: yup
Emperør Rhaast: LO
Emperør Rhaast: he wont ff
Emperør Rhaast: but nayway
Emperør Rhaast: dude
Emperør Rhaast: he literally admitted to intentionally losing in chat lol
Emperør Rhaast: "i go feed for real"
Emperør Rhaast: "thank fiddle i go feed"
Emperør Rhaast: all yup
Emperør Rhaast: yup
Emperør Rhaast: ty
Emperør Rhaast: worth ryze xd
Emperør Rhaast: you can get 2 reports after this game then
Emperør Rhaast: fiddle actually just throwing
Emperør Rhaast: teemo and fiddle are saying no
Emperør Rhaast: who is declining then ?
Emperør Rhaast: xd
Emperør Rhaast: fiddle play like a dog and teemo trolling onn purpose
Emperør Rhaast: he decided to int after
Emperør Rhaast: and blame the jg
Emperør Rhaast: fiddle need no rep he just had abaggame
Emperør Rhaast: teemo is inting
Emperør Rhaast: fiddle is feeding
Emperør Rhaast: but teemo is inting
Emperør Rhaast: nice report teemo pls


I didn't swear at anyone. I wasn't being toxic, I was simply irritated with this teemo's childish behavior (constant blaming jungler, telling us he would feed, I even defended fiddle when everyone wanted to report him for inting as well despite it being a bad game.) I've had 2 week bans and permabans before, but never one for this mild of a game, this was the ONLY game in the logs by the way. I was honestly super confused because my client completely froze up during the end screen before I could report the dude, and I got banned after the honor screen. I don't usually talk with trolls but this was the last game I had time to play and it ruffled my feathers that the time was wasted because of one dude deciding to troll. Of course I wasn't the most positive, wanting to ff and calling fiddle a feeder (that was more to point out the difference between teemo intentionally losing and fiddle having a bad game, but still) but seriously, one game? I get banned for ONE mildly bad game after I hadn't said anything for so long, demonstrated by the fact that there's no other games on the log? Imma have to send in a support ticket for this one.

replies.body:
Sorry, but you were negative, called someone dog, accused them of feeding and asked for reports. Non of these things will help you with punishing them, they only draw your and yours team focus away from game and probably further tilted you.

One report is enough for ban, no need to ask for them.

By insulting someone, you are lowering yourself to their lvl.

Submit ticket if you feel like they inted.

I said that he was feeding to demonstrate the difference; that he was having a bad game and the teemo was straight up trolling.  Never said he was a dog, said he was playing like one. Sure it's still pretty bad, but hardly worth getting banned for 1 singular game for.

You need to understand you weren’t banned for this single game. Every single game you have been marked for is included, they don’t magically go away after you serve your punishment (chat restriction). They stay on your account for months, and only get removed with playing (while you have good behavior). After this, you are ONE game away from a ban. Learn from this.
That isn't how it works. This was the only game I was penalized for.

No it wasn’t, as you admitted you were punished with a chat restriction. Those games don’t go away when your chat restriction is over. You were banned for tons of games of negativity and harassment. They only showed you one.
also, how did I accuse him of feeding lol? I stated a straight up fact, he was feeding. nothing bad about that, everyone feeds sometimes. pro players too.

If that's "barely speaking," I'm afraid to ask what it was like before your chat restrictions.

This is worthy of a 14-day suspension because you ignored the smaller punishments that warned you to stop breaking the ToS you agreed to when you made an account. If you keep using chat to argue, insult, accuse, and harass people when you get back from your suspension, you'll find yourself permabanned.

-I wasn't arguing wtih anyone. 
-Didn't accuse anyone of anything either.
-I insulted our jungler by saying he was playing like a dog. that's it.

It's not barely speaking, it's barely saying anything ban-worthy. My past chat bans were pretty bad, mainly me getting upset at others, usually the supports and junglers in this elo that don't have a clue about wave management, but I didn't swear, the worst thing I said was "dog". So how's that equal me being banned for ONE bad game, 1?

You weren't punished for misbehaving in one game. You were punished for misbehaving in _one more_ game, in a consistent pattern of negative behavior that breaks the game's rules. Additionally, the reform card doesn't always show all the matches that led to your punishment: it randomly selects up to several matches. You might see three matches, but you also might see as few as one, even for players whose punishment stems not from a small number of egregious infractions but rather from dozens of instances of mild toxicity. The purpose of the reform card is to tell you how to reform, so it shows you an example of the behavior that prompted your punishment and explains that such behavior is inappropriate and should be avoided if you want to maintain an account in good standing.
Yes it does. I've had times I was banned, and in the logs it showed games from 6, 7, 8 months ago.

The simple fact you are posting here proves you dont know how it works. Where does it say that a reform card must contain X games minimum? Where does it say toxicity is only wishing Ebola to mothers? Spamming useless sterile sarcastic comments is forbidden as well. Some people reach permabans without being horribly vulgar or wishing horrible things to sisters. They are simply repeatedly negative and follow the protocol 10cr, 25cr, 14d, perma. The game you are displaying is not hardcore by itself but takes place after chat restrictions, hence the 14d ban. If it was your very very first offense, maybe you would have only gotten 10 chat restrictions or nothing.

You got 14d ban because you KEPT breaking rules, remember you didnt lose the account for one last incident only. Its an accumulation of negativity/toxicity. And reform cards are almost never exhaustive.

A simple "stfu" in 15 days could trigger a permaban but dont think for a second you would have lost your account permanently because of a simple "stfu". Accumulation of negativity is the topic here.

Its because when you ignore punishments, you get on thinner and thinner ice. So yes, you are one negative game away from a permanent ban.

School, work, small crime (ex: speeding), etc. If you get pulled over for going 10 miles over, you might get a warning your first time. But if its your 3rd time in a few months, even if you’re only going 5 over, you will get a harsher punishment.
